recipe.label: BLT Pasta Salad recipes
ingredientLines: 1 pound (16 ounces) dried gluten free rotini pasta (my favorite brand is Barilla)
1/4 cup (4 fluid ounces) chicken stock or pasta water, plus more as necessary
2 tablespoons (1 fluid ounce) apple cider vinegar (or white wine vinegar)
1 pound (about 3 cups) cherry tomatoes, sliced in half
5 ounces baby spinach or mixed baby greens
3 ounces finely grated asiago cheese (or Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese)

recipe.label: Risotto Alla Carbonara
ingredientLines: 2 ounces guanciale, diced (bacon or pancetta would work, too)
1/4 cup dry vermouth or white wine
1 1/2 to 1 3/4 cups chicken broth (especially Better Than Bouillon), kept hot in a separate saucepan over low heat
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Finely grated Pecorino Romano, to taste, plus shavings for garnish
